siteMetadata.title: Jagadish, K.

author.minibio: Jagadish, K. is a Software engineer and has been working on websites since 2008.He enjoys building web-applications and playing with the various shiny tools in the world of Javascript.He likes to document his learnings so they can show the way for others as well as serve as a reminder for himself.
author.name: Jagadish, K.

siteMetadata.description: Musings of an old Javascript developer named Jagadish, K.
